inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space
inputs.helpMarkDown: The space within Octopus. This must be the name of the space, not the id.

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project within Octopus. This must be the name of the project, not the id.

inputs.name: ReleaseNumber
inputs.label: Release Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of the release to deploy.

inputs.name: Environments
inputs.label: Deploy to Environments
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of environments to deploy to, one environment per line. (Note: multiple on a line, separated by commas, is supported to ease migration from earlier versions of the step but this format should be considered deprecated)

inputs.name: Variables
inputs.label: Values for prompted variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable values to pass to the deployment, use syntax `variable: value`

inputs.name: UseGuidedFailure
inputs.label: Use guided failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to use guided failure mode if errors occur during the deployment.

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments (deprecated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments are no longer supported. This field has been retained to ease migration from earlier versions of the step but values should be moved to the appropriate fields.

OutputVariables.name: server_tasks
OutputVariables.description: List of server tasks representing the deployment server tasks.
